# LinkedIn, Professional

```
Introducing Weeb-CLI - A Terminal-Based Anime Platform

An open-source Python CLI application demonstrating modern software architecture patterns:

Technical Highlights:
- Provider Pattern for pluggable anime sources
- Queue-based download management with Aria2/yt-dlp
- SQLite database with WAL mode
- OAuth integration (MAL/AniList)
- Non-interactive JSON API for automation
- Torznab-compatible server for *arr stack integration

Tech Stack: Python, Typer, Rich, BeautifulSoup4, curl_cffi, SQLite

Install: pip install weeb-cli
GitHub: https://github.com/ewgsta/weeb-cli

#OpenSource #Python #CLI #Anime #SoftwareArchitecture
```
